title: Jonas Vingegaard on Giro d’Italia Rumors: ‘It Could Be Cool, but the Tour de France Comes First’
content:
Jonas Vingegaard confirms he's mulling a run at the Giro but only if it makes sense for July: 'The Tour de France is the biggest thing in cycling.'

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard on Giro d’Italia Rumors: ‘It Could Be Cool, but the Tour de France Comes First’ on Velo.
author: ahood
